amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 119-130 to require HHS to convene a public meeting to improve awareness of, access to, and information related to funding opportunities related to mental health and SUD programs of SAMHSA grant programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
